s0102.chinese: 十六年九月，發卒受地韓南陽假守騰。
s0102.literal: In the sixteenth year, ninth month, they dispatched troops to receive the lands of Han's Nanyang under Acting Governor Teng.
s0102.idiomatic: In the sixteenth year, ninth month, they dispatched troops to receive the lands of Han's Nanyang under Acting Governor Teng.

s0103.literal: For the first time, males were ordered to register their age.
s0103.idiomatic: For the first time, males were ordered to register their age.

s0106.chinese: 十七年，內史騰攻韓，得韓王安，盡納其地，以其地為郡，命曰潁川。
s0106.literal: In the seventeenth year, Palace Attendant Teng attacked Han, captured King An of Han, completely absorbed his territory, made it a commandery, and named it Yingchuan.
s0106.idiomatic: In the seventeenth year, Palace Attendant Teng attacked Han, captured King An of Han, completely absorbed his territory, made it a commandery, and named it Yingchuan.

s0110.chinese: 十八年，大興兵攻趙，王翦將上地，下井陘，端和將河內，羌瘣伐趙，端和圍邯鄲城。
s0110.literal: In the eighteenth year, they greatly mobilized troops to attack Zhao: Wang Jian commanded the Upper Lands and descended through Jingxing; Duanhe commanded Henei; Qiang Hui attacked Zhao; Duanhe besieged the city of Handan.
s0110.idiomatic: In the eighteenth year, they greatly mobilized troops to attack Zhao: Wang Jian commanded the Upper Lands and descended through Jingxing; Duanhe commanded Henei; Qiang Hui attacked Zhao; Duanhe besieged the city of Handan.

s0111.chinese: 十九年，王翦、羌瘣盡定取趙地東陽，得趙王。
s0111.literal: In the nineteenth year, Wang Jian and Qiang Hui completely pacified and took Zhao's territory of Dongyang and captured the King of Zhao.
s0111.idiomatic: In the nineteenth year, Wang Jian and Qiang Hui completely pacified and took Zhao's territory of Dongyang and captured the King of Zhao.

s0112.literal: They led troops intending to attack Yan and garrisoned at Zhongshan.
s0112.idiomatic: They led troops intending to attack Yan and garrisoned at Zhongshan.

s0113.chinese: 秦王之邯鄲，諸嘗與王生趙時母家有仇怨，皆阬之。
s0113.literal: When the King of Qin went to Handan, all those who had feuds or grievances with the king's maternal family from when he was born in Zhao were buried alive.
s0113.idiomatic: When the King of Qin went to Handan, all those who had feuds or grievances with the king's maternal family from when he was born in Zhao were buried alive.

s0114.literal: The King of Qin returned, passing through Taiyuan and Shangjun.
s0114.idiomatic: The King of Qin returned, passing through Taiyuan and Shangjun.

s0115.literal: The First Emperor's mother, the Queen Mother, died.
s0115.idiomatic: The First Emperor's mother, the Queen Mother, died.

s0116.chinese: 趙公子嘉率其宗數百人之代，自立為代王，東與燕合兵，軍上谷。
s0116.literal: Prince Jia of Zhao led several hundred of his clansmen to Dai, proclaimed himself King of Dai, joined forces with Yan to the east, and stationed his army at Shanggu.
s0116.idiomatic: Prince Jia of Zhao led several hundred of his clansmen to Dai, proclaimed himself King of Dai, joined forces with Yan to the east, and stationed his army at Shanggu.

s0118.chinese: 二十年，燕太子丹患秦兵至國，恐，使荊軻刺秦王。
s0118.literal: In the twentieth year, Crown Prince Dan of Yan was troubled that Qin troops were coming to his state; afraid, he sent Jing Ke to assassinate the King of Qin.
s0118.idiomatic: In the twentieth year, Crown Prince Dan of Yan was troubled that Qin troops were coming to his state; afraid, he sent Jing Ke to assassinate the King of Qin.

s0119.chinese: 秦王覺之，體解軻以徇，而使王翦、辛勝攻燕。
s0119.literal: The King of Qin discovered this, had Ke dismembered as a warning, and sent Wang Jian and Xin Sheng to attack Yan.
s0119.idiomatic: The King of Qin discovered this, had Ke dismembered as a warning, and sent Wang Jian and Xin Sheng to attack Yan.

s0120.chinese: 燕、代發兵擊秦軍，秦軍破燕易水之西。
s0120.literal: Yan and Dai mobilized troops to strike the Qin army; the Qin army defeated Yan west of the Yi River.
s0120.idiomatic: Yan and Dai mobilized troops to strike the Qin army; the Qin army defeated Yan west of the Yi River.
